captions.text:
Personally, I don't sleep
the night before the event,
I stay up thinking.

Some people think we are thugs
and show offs,
we are not, that's a sport to us.

we invest a lot of our time 
and money

to prove ourselves 
and represent Lebanon.
It truly is an amazing feeling.

I think the best thing 
I could do in my life
is being a drifter.
The best drifter in Lebanon
is Bassam Zahalan.
The final round was a bit difficult.

The competitors were pushing 
hard for first place.
I want to thank all those who stood by me
and helped me get here.
This is a sport, a hobby.
Outrageous!
It is a great feeling
because I will represent Lebanon

in the ME Championship 
in Dubai

We're going to prepare 
something great
and make Lebanon proud.

title: Drift Racing through Lebanon - Red Bull Car Park Drift 2014

comments.text:
*Drift Racing through Lebanon - Red Bull Car Park Drift 2014*

+Red Bull CLICK CC for English!!!
Bassam Zahalan clinched Lebanon's King of Drift title, and will represent 
his country at the Red Bull Car Park Drift 2014's Regional Finals in Dubai. 
In an intense show, Lebanon's motorsports scene drifted back to the roots 
as the country's best drifters took to the Charles Helou Bus Station for an 
underground drifting show like no other.
_

Experience the world of Red Bull like you have never seen it before. With 
the best action sports clips on the web and YouTube exclusive series, 
prepare for your "stoke factor" to be at an all time high.﻿

comments.author: Dogfishunter

comments.text:
It is a anti lag system, the system injects fuel into the exhaust manifold 
before the turbo to keep the it spinning eradicating the turbo lag. The 
flames are from the hot exhaust mani igniting this fuel which kepps the 
turbo spinning up. Used in WRC a lot.
comments.author: Daniel P.S (DPSVideos)

comments.text:

limit or just below.
